entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Bonaventure
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:31 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow at times heavy beginning after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
